languages.text: "Мы не дадим вражеским подкреплениям ударить вас в спину — умрем, но не подпустим к вам противника!"
"We'll stop their reinforcements from attempting any rear attacks. We will die before we let the enemy reach you!"
languages.original_text: "Мы не дадим вражеским подкреплениям ударить вас в спину — умрем, но не подпустим к вам противника!"

traits.locale_text: "We will stop their reinforcements from attempting any rear attacks. We'll die before we let the enemy reach you!"
"We will stop their reinforcements from attempting any rear attacks. We'll die before we let the enemy reach you!"
"We'll stop their reinforcements from attempting any rear attacks. We will die before we let the enemy reach you!"
"We'll stop their reinforcements from attempting any rear attacks. We will die before we let the enemy reach you!"
"We'll stop their reinforcements from attempting any rear attacks. We will die before we let the enemy reach you!"
"We'll stop their reinforcements from attempting any rear attacks. We will die before we let the enemy reach you!"

languages.text: "Wir sorgen dafür, dass uns ihre Verstärkung nicht in den Rücken fällt. Bevor der Feind Euch erreicht, sterben wir!"
languages.original_text: "We'll stop their reinforcements from attempting any rear attacks. We will die before we let the enemy reach you!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir sorgen dafür, dass uns ihre Verstärkung nicht in den Rücken fällt. Bevor der Feind Euch erreicht, sterben wir!"

languages.text: « Nous empêcherons leurs renforts de tenter de vous prendre à revers. Nous préférons mourir plutôt que laisser l'ennemi arriver jusqu'à vous ! »
languages.original_text: "We'll stop their reinforcements from attempting any rear attacks. We will die before we let the enemy reach you!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous empêcherons leurs renforts de tenter de vous prendre à revers. Nous préférons mourir plutôt que laisser l'ennemi arriver jusqu'à vous ! »

languages.text: «Impediremos que sus refuerzos lancen un ataque por la retaguardia. ¡El enemigo tendrá que pasar por encima de nuestros cadáveres!».
languages.original_text: "We'll stop their reinforcements from attempting any rear attacks. We will die before we let the enemy reach you!"

traits.locale_text: «Impediremos que sus refuerzos lancen un ataque por la retaguardia. ¡El enemigo tendrá que pasar por encima de nuestros cadáveres!».

languages.text: “我们会阻止敌方援军从后方包抄。哪怕是死，我们也绝不会让敌人接近您！”
languages.original_text: "We'll stop their reinforcements from attempting any rear attacks. We will die before we let the enemy reach you!"

traits.locale_text: “我们会阻止敌方援军从后方包抄。哪怕是死，我们也绝不会让敌人接近您！”

languages.text: 「敵の増援が背後から攻撃してくるのを阻止します。敵があなたのところに辿り着かぬよう、我々が命がけで阻止します！」
languages.original_text: "We'll stop their reinforcements from attempting any rear attacks. We will die before we let the enemy reach you!"

traits.locale_text: 「敵の増援が背後から攻撃してくるのを阻止します。敵があなたのところに辿り着かぬよう、我々が命がけで阻止します！」

languages.text: "Takviyelerin arkadan yaklaşıp size saldırmasına engel olacağız. Düşmanın size ulaşmasına müsaade etmektense ölürüz daha iyi!"
languages.original_text: "We'll stop their reinforcements from attempting any rear attacks. We will die before we let the enemy reach you!"

traits.locale_text: "Takviyelerin arkadan yaklaşıp size saldırmasına engel olacağız. Düşmanın size ulaşmasına müsaade etmektense ölürüz daha iyi!"
